inclusion.criterion: Clinically diagnosed as COPD by physicians
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Obtain any one of exacerbating symptoms (increased dyspnoea, sputum production, sputum volume, wheeze, cough or exertional dyspnoea)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Severe mobility problems (e.g. significant painful arthritis)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 60-year-old Spanish man presenting with shortness of breath, known case of COPD since 2 years ago.
